name: Printcraft Card Company, Inc., Appellant, v. Ferraro

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandarino, JJ.
parties: Printcraft Card Company, Inc., Appellant, v. Ferraro.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party pay own costs. See Hayes v. Altman, 438 Pa. 451, 266 A.2d 269 (1970).
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Edmund K. Trent, with him Rióhwrd W. BerUnger, Reed, Smith, Shaw & MoGlay, and MaUs, Tolson & Mails, for appellant.
Hwrry N. Moran, Jr., with him Rudolph W. DeStefano, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Printcraft Card Company, Inc., Appellant, v. Ferraro.
Argued November 13, 1973.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Mandarino, JJ.
Edmund K. Trent, with him Rióhwrd W. BerUnger, Reed, Smith, Shaw & MoGlay, and MaUs, Tolson & Mails, for appellant.

January 24, 1974:
